data: `minecraft:on_fall_on` is an Event Trigger for when an actor falls and lands on the block.

data.Name: condition
data.Description: The condition of event to be executed on the block.

data.Name: event
data.Description: The event executed on the block.

data.Name: min_fall_distance
data.Description: The minimum distance in blocks that an actor needs to fall to trigger this event.

data.Name: target
data.Description: The target of event executed on the block.
